verbs.description: red sox dispute report party after [ARG1: world series win] [V: cost] [ARG2: 500 000] representatives of the boston red sox are disputing a report that a nightclub party following their world series victory cost an even 500 000 the expensive claim was published friday by tmz sports specifically it reported that the bill for the team celebration at a los angeles nightclub was around 300 000 and the team left a tip of 195 000 tmz claimed to have seen an itemized receipt detailing the purchase of 48 bottles of dom 43 los angeles dodgers boston boston red sox 500 000 zineb curran los angeles red sox world series
